Posts.Content: I recently read an article about metformin used for cancer treatment. Some positive results have been seen but depending on a dose it has a lot of side effects. Some studies showed great results and some others didn't. Here are the links I found. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26861738 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26316884 http://www.cancermind.com/metformin-...atment-effect/ http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27011019 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26434885 Hope that helps
Posts.Title: Metformin

Posts.Content: Positive attitude is very important It does help.
